answerText: Children of Gebelaawi [or Children of the Alley][10] Mahfouz, the author of Children of Gebelaawi, also wrote this set of novels including Palace Walk and Palace of Desire.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 5 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The last section of this book tells of Arafa, a magician who strangles a black servant, which causes the title character to die of shock. [10] Name this book in which both Adam and Arafa attempt to look into a forbidden book of knowledge, though neither succeeds.
